title: Gemini's latest and greatest image generator is now available to all
description: Google's latest and highest quality AI image generator is called Imagen 3 and it promises to bring "an even higher degree of photorealism", "better instruction following", and "fewer distracting artifacts" than ever before. It's also going to unleash "crisp detail", "vibrant color" and "fewer imperfections". It supports diverse styles from classic oils to modern digital art. And now, everyone can use Imagen 3 through Google's Gemini, as it's been rolled out extensively to all users, including those who aren't subscribing to a Gemini paid plan. Image generation with Imagen 3 is now...
excerpt: It promises the highest-quality images with the least amount of imperfections. Google's latest and highest quality AI image generator is called Imagen 3...
text: Google's latest and highest quality AI image generator is called Imagen 3 and it promises to bring "an even higher degree of photorealism", "better instruction following", and "fewer distracting artifacts" than ever before. It's also going to unleash "crisp detail", "vibrant color" and "fewer imperfections". It supports diverse styles from classic oils to modern digital art. And now, everyone can use Imagen 3 through Google's Gemini, as it's been rolled out extensively to all users, including those who aren't subscribing to a Gemini paid plan. Image generation with Imagen 3 is now available to all Gemini users around the world.Imagen 3 is our highest quality image generation model yet and brings an even higher degree of photorealism, better instruction following, and fewer distracting artifacts than ever before. pic.twitter.com/E8CrcyFcz5— Google Gemini App (@GeminiApp) October 9, 2024 Unlike some other AI image generators, Imagen 3 only generates one image for each of your prompts - you may see this as an advantage or a disadvantage. The resolution of the generated images is 2048x2048. The header image for this article was generated by Imagen 3 (prompt: generate an image of AI).
html:
Google's latest and highest quality AI image generator is called Imagen 3 and it promises to bring "an even higher degree of photorealism", "better instruction following", and "fewer distracting artifacts" than ever before. It's also going to unleash "crisp detail", "vibrant color" and "fewer imperfections". It supports diverse styles from classic oils to modern digital art.

And now, everyone can use Imagen 3 through Google's Gemini, as it's been rolled out extensively to all users, including those who aren't subscribing to a Gemini paid plan.

Image generation with Imagen 3 is now available to all Gemini users around the world.

Imagen 3 is our highest quality image generation model yet and brings an even higher degree of photorealism, better instruction following, and fewer distracting artifacts than ever before. pic.twitter.com/E8CrcyFcz5

— Google Gemini App (@GeminiApp) October 9, 2024

Unlike some other AI image generators, Imagen 3 only generates one image for each of your prompts - you may see this as an advantage or a disadvantage. The resolution of the generated images is 2048x2048. The header image for this article was generated by Imagen 3 (prompt: generate an image of AI).
